Notes: A special area that projects compatible objects inside it onto a sphere around the zone's origin. The area's initial placement will be used for the calculations. Therefore, the switches are effectively useless.

Obj_arg0.Name: Projection Radius
Obj_arg0.Description: The radius of the sphere that the objects will get projected on.

SW_APPEAR.Description: The object will appear when this switch is activated.

SW_AWAKE.Description: The object will become visible and resume movement when this switch is activated.

BaseMtxFollower.Description: Objects of this class can follow another BaseMtxFollowTarget object.
